Text: AirTran Airways New Winter Saleare pleased to announce a new sale for Winter travel that puts every city in our system on sale for travel through March This sale requires a day advance purchase and discounts range up to off the already low fares we offer everyday Seats are limited and may be unavailable on some days and flights that operate during peak and holiday travel times such as the Christmas New Year and Presidents Day holiday periods You must purchase reservationscgibinflightsearchcgi tickets by December Receive a BONUS discount if you make your sale fare booking online at wwwairtrancom Remember Travel may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and dont require a roundtrip purchase Following is just a small sample of oneway sale fares Atlanta Boston Atlanta make your sale fare booking online at wwwairtrancom And now for the best deals on earth You know that youll always get a great deal on airfare from AirTran Airways but did you know that AirTran Airways has partnered with the Hertz Corporation to give you special low rates on Hertz car rentals To get these great rates click on the Hertz icon after you have completed your AirTran Airways booking You will be transferred to the Hertz website and the AirTran discount will be automatically applied AirTran Airways and Hertz making travel affordable Youve got a great airfare from AirTran Airways Now complete your travel package with a low rate from the Hilton Family of Hotels Just click on the following link and check out Hilton Family Value Rates at most AirTran Airways destinations wwwhiltoncomspecialsvaluesmainhtml Sale Fares other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Travel on sale fares must be purchased no later than December All travel must be complete by March Fares have a day advance purchase restriction and may be combined with regular fares to complete an itinerary Travel is not valid on December or February Travel also may not be available to and from select cities during other periods of high passenger demand Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of up to for each segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included Fares tofrom Grand Bahama Island do not include in roundtrip taxes As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUASPA and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
